CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Grand Prize - Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president and publisher of the Courier, heartily congratulates Mrs. Thelma Jefferies, 633 Ossipee Street, grand-prize winner of a special Crosley Shelvador Refrigerator."
TitMainTitle: Thelma Jefferies and Jessie Vann shaking hands, standing on stage in front of open refrigerator, in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Kitchen appliances--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stages (Platforms)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Handshaking--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Jefferies, Thelma.
